member.name: POINTER_PEN_INFO
member.summary: Defines basic pen information common to all pointer types.

member.name: POINTER_PEN_INFO.penFlags
member.summary: The pen flag. This member can be zero or any reasonable combination of the values from the Pen Flags constants.

member.name: POINTER_PEN_INFO.penMask
member.summary: The pen mask. This member can be zero or any reasonable combination of the values from the Pen Mask constants.

member.name: POINTER_PEN_INFO.pressure
member.summary: A pen pressure normalized to a range between 0 and 1024. The default is 0 if the device does not report pressure.

member.name: POINTER_PEN_INFO.rotation
member.summary: The clockwise rotation, or twist, of the pointer normalized in a range of 0 to 359. The default is 0.

member.name: POINTER_PEN_INFO.tiltX
member.summary: The angle of tilt of the pointer along the x-axis in a range of -90 to +90, with a positive value indicating a tilt to the right. The default is 0.

member.name: POINTER_PEN_INFO.tiltY
member.summary: The angle of tilt of the pointer along the y-axis in a range of -90 to +90, with a positive value indicating a tilt toward the user. The default is 0.
